comments.author: sergio.rita@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; InfoPath.1)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.4) Gecko/20070515 Firefox/2.0.0.4

I have a web application that has a button to close itself. I tried to use the simple window.close() but by security reasons it just didn't work. So I tried to open a window to a page that closes its parent and itself. When I executed this last solution I have obtained the following exception message from the error console:

Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIObserverService.removeObserver]"  nsresult: "0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE)"  location: "JS frame :: chrome://browser/content/browser.js :: BrowserShutdown :: line 965"  data: no]

If I'm making some mistake please tell me.

Thks in advance.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.
2.
3.
comments.creator: sergio.rita@gmail.com

Thks in advance.
